body:
Hi Marcel,


There are a number of graphical user interface that you can use for Radiance and Daysim. An example tool that provides introductory tutorials and supports daylight availability and glare analysis is DIVA-for-Rhino (http://diva4rhino.com/).


Best,


Christoph
___
